name: Secure Send
tag_list: cyber-security, communications, enterprise, data-transfer, saas, privacy
overview: Secure Send is the next generation communication and data transfer solution for businesses. Built from the ground up with security as its first priority, Secure Send’s IV/PG (Identity Verified Privacy Guaranteed) communications platform validates user identity, guarantees end-to-end protection and privacy, gives visibility and control in enterprise environments, and provides real time risk tracking and mitigation. Secure Send is led by a team of business leaders with deep expertise in cyber-security, SaaS, and secure communications across multiple key industries. The timing for Secure Send is ideal as public awareness of cyber threats and privacy needs is growing rapidly.
